data_table.description: EDIC. Peripheral vascular disease of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: IBB1B
variable.description: B1b. Recognition of event. Check here if date uncertain

variable.name: IBB3
variable.description: B3. Recognition of event. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: IBB4A
variable.description: B4a. Recognition of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event? Emergency room

variable.name: IBB4B
variable.description: B4b. Recognition of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event? In-patient hospitalization

variable.name: IBB4C
variable.description: B4c. Recognition of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event? Deidentified EDIC clinic

variable.name: IBB4D
variable.description: B4d. Recognition of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event? Other, specify

variable.name: IBC1
variable.description: C1. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). Do you get pain in either leg walking

variable.name: IBC2
variable.description: C2. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). Does pain begin when standing/sitting

variable.name: IBC3R
variable.description: C3r. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). In what part of your (right) leg does the pain occur?

variable.name: IBC3L
variable.description: C3l. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). In what part of your (left) leg the pain occur?

variable.name: IBC4
variable.description: C4. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). Does patient have pain if he/she walk uphill or in hurry?

variable.name: IBC5
variable.description: C5. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). Does patient have pain when walking at ordinary pace?

variable.name: IBC6
variable.description: C6. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). Does the pain disappear while walking

variable.name: IBC7
variable.description: C7. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What do you do if you get pain when walking?

variable.name: IBC8
variable.description: C8. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What happens to pain if you stand still?

variable.name: IBC9
variable.description: C9. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). If pain is relieved by standing still how soon does relief occur?

variable.name: IBC10
variable.description: C10. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). Since first noticing the pain, has the patient noticed a change in its severity?

variable.name: IBC11
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). Any diagnostic tests performed?

variable.name: IBC11TE1
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What tests were performed? Test 1

variable.name: IBC11RE1
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What were the results? Result 1

variable.name: IBC11TE2
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What tests were performed? Test 2

variable.name: IBC11RE2
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What were the results? Result 2

variable.name: IBC11TE3
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What tests were performed? Test 3

variable.name: IBC11RE3
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What were the results? Result 3

variable.name: IBC11TE4
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What tests were performed? Test 4

variable.name: IBC11RE4
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What were the results? Result 4

variable.name: IBC11TE5
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What tests were performed? Test 5

variable.name: IBC11RE5
variable.description: C11. Intermittent claudication(peripheral ischemia). What were the results? Result 5

variable.name: IBD1R
variable.description: D1r. Amputation: part of right lower extremity or part

variable.name: IBD1L
variable.description: D1l. Amputation: part of left lower extremity or part

variable.name: IBD2AR
variable.description: D2ar. Amputation: right, traumatic

variable.name: IBD2AL
variable.description: D2al. Amputation: left, traumatic

variable.name: IBD2BR
variable.description: D2br. Amputation: right, surgical

variable.name: IBD2BL
variable.description: D2bl. Amputation: left, surgical

variable.name: IBE1
variable.description: E1. Other arterial events. Has patient had other arterial events

variable.name: IBE2A
variable.description: E2a. Other arterial events: bypass

variable.name: IBE2B
variable.description: E2b. Other arterial events: angioplasty

variable.name: IBE2C
variable.description: E2c.Other arterial events

variable.name: IBF1
variable.description: F1. Lower extremity ulcer. Has the patient had extremity ulcer

variable.name: IBF2LEGR
variable.description: F2. Lower extremity ulcer: right leg

variable.name: IBF2LEGL
variable.description: F2. Lower extremity ulcer: left leg

variable.name: IBF2FOTR
variable.description: F2. Lower extremity ulcer: right foot

variable.name: IBF2FOTL
variable.description: F2. Lower extremity ulcer: left foot

variable.name: IBF3AFOT
variable.description: F3a. Lower ulcer: traumatic foot

variable.name: IBF3ALEG
variable.description: F3a. Lower ulcer: traumatic leg

variable.name: IBF3BFOT
variable.description: F3b. Lower ulcer: non-traumatic foot

variable.name: IBF3BLEG
variable.description: F3b. Lower ulcer: non-traumatic leg

variable.name: IBF3CFOT
variable.description: F3c. Lower ulcer: excavation of subcutaneous, foot

variable.name: IBF3CLEG
variable.description: F3c. Lower ulcer: excavation of subcutaneous, leg

variable.name: IBF3DFOT
variable.description: F3d. Lower ulcer: loss subcutaneous tissue, foot

variable.name: IBF3DLEG
variable.description: F3d. Lower ulcer: loss subcutaneous tissue, leg

variable.name: IBF3EFOT
variable.description: F3e. Lower ulcer: inflammation in foot

variable.name: IBF3ELEG
variable.description: F3e. Lower ulcer: inflammation in leg

variable.name: IBF3FFOT
variable.description: F3f. Lower ulcer: infection in foot

variable.name: IBF3FLEG
variable.description: F3f. Lower ulcer: infection in leg

variable.name: IBF3GFOT
variable.description: F3g. Lower ulcer: treatment in office, foot

variable.name: IBF3GLEG
variable.description: F3g. Lower ulcer: treatment in office, leg

variable.name: IBF3HFOT
variable.description: F3h. Lower ulcer: treatment in hospital, foot

variable.name: IBF3HLEG
variable.description: F3h. Lower ulcer: treatment in hospital, leg

variable.name: IBF3OTHF
variable.description: F3. Lower extremity ulcer. Other: foot

variable.name: IBF3OTHL
variable.description: F3. Lower extremity ulcer. Other: leg

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID

variable.name: IBB1ADAT
variable.description: B1a. Recognition of event. Deidentified date of occurrence

variable.name: IBB2BDAT
variable.description: B2. Recognition of event. Deidentified date clinic learned of the event
